title_zh: W25 變化 · 健康檢查（Level C：組合型）

turns.en: Hi. Please fill out this form first.
Do you take any medication regularly?
Yes, I take it ___ a day.
turns.hint_en: Yes, I take it once a day.
turns.answer: Yes, I take it once a day.

turns.en: Okay. When did you last take it?
turns.zh: 了解。你上次什麼時候吃？

turns.hint_en: I took it this morning before breakfast.
turns.hint_zh: 我今天早上早餐前吃的。
turns.answer: I took it this morning before breakfast.

turns.en: Do I need to avoid anything today?
turns.zh: 我今天需要避免什麼嗎？

turns.en: After blood work, you can eat normally.
turns.zh: 抽血後就可以正常飲食。
